entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
